name: Pancake
instructions: Mix flour, milk, eggs, and sugar in a bowl.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the pan.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.

name: Donuts
instructions: In a bowl, mix warm milk, sugar, and yeast. Let it sit for 5 minutes until foamy.
Add flour, eggs, butter, and salt. Knead into a smooth dough.
Cover and let the dough rise for 1-2 hours until doubled in size.
Roll out the dough and cut into donut shapes.
Heat oil in a deep pan and fry donuts until golden brown.
Cool slightly, then glaze or coat with sugar.

name: Pretzels
instructions: Dissolve sugar and yeast in warm water. Let it sit for 5 minutes.
Add flour, salt, and melted butter. Knead into a smooth dough.
Let the dough rise for 1 hour until doubled in size.
Divide the dough and shape into pretzels.
Boil water with baking soda and briefly dip pretzels in the solution.
Bake at 220°C (425°F) for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.

name: Cookies
instructions: Cream together butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract, then mix well.
Combine flour and baking soda, then fold into the wet mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Scoop dough onto a baking sheet and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 10-12 minutes.

name: Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 250°C (480°F).
Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking tray or stone.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese and desired toppings.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

name: Carbonara Pasta
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water.
In a bowl, whisk egg yolks and Parmesan cheese until smooth.
Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy. Add minced garlic and cook briefly.
Toss hot spaghetti with pancetta and garlic. Remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
